title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 361.5 - Proof of ability to process claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 361.5 - Proof of ability to process claims

State Regulations

Each applicant shall submit proof satisfactory to the
chair that adequate provision has been made by the applicant to comply with the
obligation to pay benefits, and upon request, shall satisfy the Chair that such
provision is kept effective. The use of third-party administrators is
restricted to those third-party administrators that are licensed by the

Workers' Compensation Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
361.5

Amended

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
